title: Trade Gothic Alternative
content:
Can anyone recommend an alternative please?

Thanks in advance.
author: doj

comments.content:
Hey, thanks so much for this suggestion, it's perfect, and I own it too! Which is why I needed a good alternative to Trade Gothic.

Very much appreciated.

for future reference you could try Benton Sans by Font Bureau - [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonSans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081704/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonSans "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BentonSans") - it's a new take on News Gothic.
